TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
Or we can slap and advertisment here and there like they do here.

We do generate quite a bit of traffic.

> 
> Or we can slap and advertisment here and there like they do here.
> 
> We do generate quite a bit of traffic.

You do actually. An average of 5-13 thousand page views per day, or exactly 146,348 page views since June 23rd, a little over a month (not much when compared to this forum, but still quite a bit).

> 
> You do actually. An average of 5-13 thousand page views per day, or exactly 146,348 page views since June 23rd, a little over a month (not much when compared to this forum, but still quite a bit).

I never realized how much we use the refresh button.
Refresh abuse to the max

> 
> Refresh abuse to the max

MOAR REFRESH!
Anyone getting a server error connection on this?
Am I the only one now getting PHP gibberish?

404 error.

Bullcrap.
Alright, Imandreas what did you do know?
I believe we blew past the 10GB per month...
Then we\'d get a message saying so, not PHP errors.
It is indeed a PHP meltdown on the forum, no one gets to RP.

> 
> Alright, Imandreas what did you do know?

I was about to post that something was blown up by the VR, along with screenshot evidence to show it passed the 25% chance nerfing I used to make it fair.

> 
> I was about to post that something was blown up by the VR, along with screenshot evidence to show it passed the 25% chance nerfing I used to make it fair.

What was blown up? My car?

> 
> What was blown up? My car?

Nope.

Rocket fuel. Lots of it was involved.

Also, it is FAR away. And in-game, leaving two areas possible.

The chance of completely untrained people sneaking a goddamned rocket launcher across about twelve countries and evading thousands of guards and soldiers is 25%?

Bull.

> 
> Nope.
> 
> Rocket fuel. Lots of it was involved.
> 
> Also, it is FAR away. And in-game, leaving two areas possible.

You stole my nuke. I am going to find you.

> 
> You stole my nuke. I am going to find you.

Nope.

> 
> The chance of completely untrained people sneaking a goddamned rocket launcher across about twelve countries and evading thousands of guards and soldiers is 25%?
> 
> Bull.

Ride a boat, ride a boat...

\*boom\*

(I never said *where* or *how* it worked. Believe me, it required serious crap to happen. Oh, and it is not in your little corner of RP.)

Moral: never build your rocket launchpad near shipping lanes in a world where someone with a single rock could destroy half of civilization.
In Imandreas land, nobody has guards, coast guards, or any kind of functional brain. And hitting something kilometres away with an unguided rocket from a small boat is easy.
Where was it!?

> 
> In Imandreas land, nobody has guards, coast guards, or any kind of functional brain. And hitting something kilometres away with an unguided rocket from a small boat is easy.

In this RP, somebody forgot to actually say they did where.

(Oh, and end now, before bans come inbound)

And thread will come when forums are up. (never)
This is not the place to delve into plans or argument, people.

> 
> PHP Error Message
> 
> Warning: Unknown: open\_basedir restriction in effect. File(/www/krp.net78.net/index.php) is not within the allowed path(s): (/home/:/usr/lib/php:/tmp) in Unknown on line 0
> 
> Free Web Hosting
> 
> PHP Error Message
> 
> Warning: Unknown: failed to open stream: Operation not permitted in Unknown on line 0
> 
> Free Web Hosting
> 
> PHP Error Message
> 
> Fatal error: Unknown: Failed opening required \'/www/krp.net78.net/index.php\' (include\_path=\'.:/usr/lib/php:/usr/local/lib/php\') in Unknown on line 0
> 
> Free Web Hosting

Has anyone gotten that before, and what does it mean?

> 
> > 
> > PHP Error Message
> > 
> > Warning: Unknown: open\_basedir restriction in effect. File(/www/krp.net78.net/index.php) is not within the allowed path(s): (/home/:/usr/lib/php:/tmp) in Unknown on line 0
> > 
> > Free Web Hosting
> > 
> > PHP Error Message
> > 
> > Warning: Unknown: failed to open stream: Operation not permitted in Unknown on line 0
> > 
> > Free Web Hosting
> > 
> > PHP Error Message
> > 
> > Fatal error: Unknown: Failed opening required \'/www/krp.net78.net/index.php\' (include\_path=\'.:/usr/lib/php:/usr/local/lib/php\') in Unknown on line 0
> > 
> > Free Web Hosting
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Has anyone gotten that before, and what does it mean?

Dependant on the situation, it could mean no RP before August 1.

> 
> Dependant on the situation, it could mean no RP before August 1.

Oh. Oh crap then.

Anyone else getting it? I\'d assume so... but I\'m usually wrong.
